Columns.Description: The time (UTC) when the event is generated
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The name of the operation represented by this event
Columns.Name: OperationName

Columns.Description: The name of the log that belongs to
Columns.Name: Category

Columns.Description: CorrelationId of the event, this can be use as a reference to join with other tables
Columns.Name: CorrelationId

Columns.Description: This shows the event details. Can be empty if synchronization is not finished
Columns.Name: DetailMessage

Columns.Description: Datashare synchronization end time, can be empty if job not finished
Columns.Name: EndTime

Columns.Description: Indicating whether the trigger is on-demand trigger or manual trigger
Columns.Name: TriggerType

Columns.Description: Indicating the dataSetMapping type, this can be Blob/container/bolbfolder,etc
Columns.Name: DataSetMappingType

Columns.Description: Indicating the dataSet type, this can be Blob/container/bolbfolder,etc
Columns.Name: DataSetType

Columns.Description: Number of files written into sink
Columns.Name: FilesWritten

Columns.Description: Number of files read from source
Columns.Name: FilesRead

Columns.Description: Size of files into sink in bytes
Columns.Name: SizeWritten

Columns.Description: Size of files read from source
Columns.Name: SizeRead

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
